remarks: In an ordered group, the ordering is compatible with group inverse. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ogrpinvlt.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ogrpinvlt.1 $e |- .< = ( lt ` G ) $.
ogrpinvlt.2 $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
ogrpinvlt $p |- ( ( ( G e. oGrp /\ ( oppG ` G ) e. oGrp ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .< Y <-> ( I ` Y ) .< ( I ` X ) ) ) $.
